organisation_name: Fundação Portuguesa "A Comunidade Contra a SIDA" (FPCCSIDA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Portuguese Foundation "The Community Against AIDS" (FPCCSIDA) was constituted on 29 
December 1993 as a Private Non-profit Social Solidarity Institution (IPSS), 
having been specially created to: 
i) Provide Direct Support to People Infected and Affected by HIV / AIDS; 
ii) Promote Information / Education for Health and HIV Prevention; 
iii) Collaborate in Scientific Research Projects in the Medical and Psychosocial area. 
FPCCSIDA is based in Lisbon and has six Delegations: one in the Northern Region (Porto), two in the Central Region (Coimbra and Seia), two in the South Region (Lisbon and Setúbal) and one in Madeira Island (Funchal)
